channel.title: Tweets on ggtree
channel.description: Recent content in Tweets on ggtree

item.title: Tweets
item.description: Leave me a message on I am having too much fun playing with ggtree, I might never edit a phylogenetic tree using Illustrator again! — Miles Zhang (@ymilesz) February 2, 2018 Didn't anticipate having to rewrite a function, but got there in the end #ggtree #rstats pic.twitter.com/SD1WpZ0sx6 — Tegan Harris (@DoctorTegs) February 1, 2018 This time I kept it all in R and used ggtree https://t.co/G1dRHsCFPL, though both plotTree and ggtree can make this style of figure.
